mapper.insert: insert into dynamics(user_id, push_time, push_content, push_image) values(#{userId},#{pushTime},#{pushContent},#{pushImg})
mapper.select: select d.id,u.user_nickname nickName,u.user_email userEmail,d.push_content pushContent,d.push_time pushTime,d.push_image pushImage,d.zan_num zanNum,d.forward_id forwardId from dynamics d,user u where u.id = d.user_id
